mapper.select: select from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA ORDER by FORM_ORDER_NUM DESC
select case when max(FORM_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(FORM_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA

select * from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA where FORM_ORDER_NUM = (select max(FORM_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA where FORM_ORDER_NUM<(select FORM_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA where HISTORY_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA where FORM_ORDER_NUM = (select min(FORM_ORDER_NUM) from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA where FORM_ORDER_NUM>(select FORM_ORDER_NUM from TB4D_HISTORY_DATA where HISTORY_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
